name: Lunatic Den
description:
"Welcome to Lunatic Den."

This is horror ADV game where you communicate the strange and delightful inhabitants while developing the town.

Play time is about 4~5 hours.

-It contains mild violence.

-The game is a sequel to the previous game "Maniac Den", but it can be played even if you haven't played the previous game.

-You can only publish videos of playing this game that are not slanderous or defamatory.

-System requirments

For Windows

OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10, Windows 11

CPU: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.

Graphics API: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.

For Mac

OS: Mac OS High Sierra 10.13+

CPU: x64 architecture with SSE2.

Graphics API: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

-Update

2022.2.14 ver.1.00 Released

2022.2.16 ver.1.01 Fixed a bug in the tutorial.
